targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  sum(amount) as value
FROM
  stg__entries_plan
WHERE
  fiscal_year = $fiscal_year
GROUP BY
  fiscal_year

SELECT 
  sum(total_allocated_amount) as value
FROM
  business_unit_cost_history
WHERE
  fiscal_year = $fiscal_year
GROUP BY
  fiscal_year

SELECT 
  unit_cost_per_employee as value
FROM
  company_cost_history
WHERE
  fiscal_year = $fiscal_year

SELECT
  time,
  plan_amount as 予算,
  cost_amount as 実績
FROM
  company_cost_history
ORDER BY
  1

SELECT
  time,
  employee_count as value
FROM
  company_cost_history
ORDER BY
  1

SELECT
  time,
  unit_cost_per_employee as value
FROM
  company_cost_history
ORDER BY
  1

SELECT
  time,
  business_unit_name as metric,
  plan_amount as 予算,
  total_allocated_amount as 実績
FROM
  business_unit_cost_history
WHERE
  fiscal_year = $fiscal_year 
ORDER BY 3 DESC

SELECT
  time,
  business_unit_name as metric,
  plan_amount as value
FROM
  business_unit_cost_history

SELECT
  time,
  business_unit_name as metric,
  total_allocated_amount as value
FROM
  business_unit_cost_history

SELECT
  time,
  business_unit_name as metric,
  unit_cost_per_employee as value
FROM
  business_unit_cost_history

panels.title: 部門 - 社員一人あたり

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  capability_name as metric,
  total_allocated_amount as 実績
FROM
  capability_cost_history
WHERE
  fiscal_year = $fiscal_year 
ORDER BY 3 DESC

panels.title: ケイパビリティ - 年度

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  capability_name as metric,
  total_allocated_amount as value
FROM
  capability_cost_history
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: ケイパビリティ - 推移

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  service_name as metric,
  total_allocated_amount as 実績
FROM
  service_cost_history
WHERE
  fiscal_year = $fiscal_year 
ORDER BY 3 DESC

SELECT
  time,
  service_name as metric,
  total_allocated_amount as value
FROM
  service_cost_history
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time,
  it_tower_name as metric,
  total_allocated_amount as 実績
FROM
  tower_cost_history 
WHERE
  fiscal_year = $fiscal_year 
ORDER BY 3 DESC

SELECT
  time,
  it_tower_name as metric,
  total_allocated_amount as value
FROM
  tower_cost_history
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time,
  cost_pool_name as metric,
  sum(total_amount) as 実績
FROM
  cost_pool_history 
WHERE
  fiscal_year = $fiscal_year 
GROUP BY
  time, cost_pool_name
ORDER BY 3 DESC

panels.title: コストプール - 年度

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  cost_pool_name as metric,
  sum(total_amount) as value
FROM
  cost_pool_history
GROUP BY
  time, cost_pool_name
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: コストプール - 推移

list.definition: select distinct(fiscal_year) from business_unit_cost_history order by 1 desc;
list.label: 年度
list.name: fiscal_year
list.query: select distinct(fiscal_year) from business_unit_cost_history order by 1 desc;
